mergeaccountpage_p: This service is only available for merging two The Club accounts registered and owned by you. If you own two The Club accounts, you can now merge your accounts to enjoy your benefits and offers more easily.
mergeaccountpage_term_1: Member must be the sole legal and beneficial owner of the two accounts to be merged.
mergeaccountpage_term_2: After the merge accounts application is submitted, one of the two accounts will be terminated, no cancellation is allowed.
mergeaccountpage_term_3: Clubpoint balance as of the time of account merged will be transferred from the account to be terminated to the remaining account.
mergeaccountpage_term_4: If the accounts being merged belong to different tiers, member will continue to enjoy the higher tier until the original expiry date for such higher tier. By way of example, holding other things constant, assuming you have a gold tier account expiring in six months, and a silver tier account expiring in 12 months. If the account to be terminated is the gold tier account, you will continue to enjoy the gold tier for the remaining six months and then enjoy the silver tier for the subsequent 6 months. However, if the account to be terminated is the silver account, you will cease to enjoy the silver tier upon merge, continue to enjoy the gold tier for the remaining six months and become a blue tier member thereafter.
mergeaccountpage_term_5: Upon the account merge, member will cease to be eligible for the Clubpoints which s/he would otherwise be entitled to in the account to be terminated for monthly spending on designated services supplied by the companies within the HKT Group or the PCCW Group. Those Clubpoints will not be credited to the remaining account after account merge.
mergeaccountpage_term_6: Any outstanding rewards, and coupons in the account to be terminated shall be forfeited, and any unfulfilled orders will be cancelled without refund of Clubpoints, cash or other compensation.
mergeaccountpage_term_7: Any outstanding Clubpoints not yet credited to the account will be forfeited once the account is terminated.
mergeaccountpage_term_8: If the account to be terminated is linked to or paired up with another account such as (i) social media accounts, (ii) accounts of companies within HKT Group or PCCW Group, and (iii) any other account member elects to use The Club account to login, such account linkage will cease to exist once the Club account is terminated. Member is responsible to manage the account linkages to prevent any loss or delay of benefits. The Club is not responsible for any loss directly or indirectly resulted from the account merge.
mergeaccountpage_term_9: Member must ensure all the information provided is true and accurate.
mergeaccountpage_term_10: In the event of any discrepancy between the English version and any translated version of these Terms & Conditions, the English language version will prevail.
mergeaccountpage_term_11: All applications for account merge are subject to approval at the absolute discretion of The Club.
mergeaccountpage_term_12: The Club reserves the right to vary or amend these Terms & Conditions without notice. In case of any dispute, the decision of The Club shall be final.
mergeaccountpage_term_13: In the event of dispute, The Club’s computer records shall prevail and The Club reserves all rights of final determination.
mergeaccountpage_term_14: Terms & Conditions of The Club apply.
mergeaccountpage_contact: To apply Merge Accounts, please contact The Club Service Hotline at 183 3000 or enquiry@theclub.com.hk

mergeaccount_terms_long_1: 1.Once the merged accounts application is confirmed, the merge process will begin and one of your Club accounts will be terminated, no cancellation is allowed and the merge is irreversible.
mergeaccount_terms_long_10: 10.The Club reserves the right to vary or amend Merge Accounts Terms & Conditions without notice.
mergeaccount_terms_long_2: 2.Any outstanding rewards and coupon redemption orders in the account to be terminated must be fulfilled before terminated, otherwise, those orders will be forfeited.
mergeaccount_terms_long_3: 3.Any account or service linkage with the account to be terminated, including but not limited to social media account, The Club product or service, HKT service, will be lost once the Club account is terminated. You are responsible to manage the account linkages to prevent any lost or delay of benefits. The Club is not responsible for any lost directly or indirectly resulted from the account merge.
mergeaccount_terms_long_4: 4.Any outstanding Clubpoints not yet credited to the account to be terminated will be forfeited once the account is terminated.
mergeaccount_terms_long_5: 5.Clubpoint balance of the two accounts will be combined while balance as of the time of accounts merge will be used.
mergeaccount_terms_long_6: 6.Clubpoints earning from eligible HKT service spending will be impacted if the Club account associated with HKT service is to be terminated.
mergeaccount_terms_long_7: 7.Should there be any adjustment for specific reasons in relation with the terminated account, adjustments will be made at your merged account, including but not limited to deduction of clubpoints or membership tier.
mergeaccount_terms_long_8: 8.About membership tier, only the current higher tier will be kept. If you have any lower tier in the account to be terminated, regardless of the original validity of the related tier program and the tier itself, that tier will be forfeited once the account is terminated.

My mobile number registered with The Club is different from my mobile number registered with Citi. What should I do?

You are advised to update your mobile number in The Club profile using the mobile number registered with Citi. Once your mobile number in The Club profile is updated, you may proceed to the points conversion.

Should you prefer to update the mobile number registered with Citi to the mobile number registered with The Club, please visit Citi’s Forms Center at www.citibank.com.hk/form , where you can download, fill in and submit the “Change of Contact Details Form”. For enquiries, please contact Citi at (+852) 2860 0333.

update_comm_pref_tnc_tag_n_go_2:
4. Cookies
Our websites and apps use cookies or similar tracking tools on your machine or device in order for Group Entities to, for example, personalize your user experience and/or maintain your identity across multiple webpages and/or Internet sessions. Our websites and apps are initially set up to accept cookies. You can opt-out of or delete historical cookies by changing the settings on your web or mobile browsers; however, if you do so, you may find that certain features on our websites and/or our apps do not work properly.

5. Access to Data
You may access and request correction of the Data we hold about you by writing to the Group’s Data Protection Officer (GPO Box 9896 or via email to privacy@pccw.com).

6. Additional Statements for Applicants of Citi The Club Credit Card
In addition, this section applies to you if you apply for or are a holder of the Citi The Club Credit Card (“Co-branded Card”).
Your Data is collected, may be used or maintained and/or disclosed, at all times to the extent permitted under applicable laws, rules, regulations and licence requirements, for the purposes of processing and facilitating your application, registration or subscription to, and exploring practical enhancements in respect of, any services or products of our business partners, including (without limitation) the Co-branded Card issued by Citibank (Hong Kong) Limited ("Citibank") and any other purposes directly relating to any of the above.
Your Data will be kept confidential but, subject to the provisions of any applicable law, rules, regulations and licence requirements, may be transferred or disclosed to Citibank for the purposes of (i) application, administration and operation of the Co-branded Card, (ii) analysis of customer behavior and usage patterns, (iii) conducting credit checks, carrying out matching procedures and maintaining Citibank’s credit scoring models (iv) exploring practical enhancements in respect of the Co-branded Card, (v) conducting promotions and marketing of offers relating to the Co-Branded Card and (vi) any other purposes set out in the Policy Statement relating to the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance of Citibank  (https://www.citibank.com.hk/english/personal-banking/pdf/useful-documents/personal-data-privacy-ordinance.pdf) (the “Citi Privacy Statement”), provided that Citibank will not use your Data for direct marketing purpose unless you have provided consent directly to Citibank. You may opt-in or opt-out of receiving direct marketing from Citibank at Citibank’s mobile application or website or any other platform operated by Citibank. In this regard, Club HKT will not accept nor process any opt-in/ opt-out request for Citibank. By applying for or holding a Co-branded Card, you agree and consent to the provision of your Data to Citibank for the above purposes and confirm that you have read and understand the Citi Privacy Statement.
update_comm_pref_tnc_tag_n_go_1:
Personal Information Collection Statement of Club HKT

Club HKT Limited (“Club HKT”, “we” or “us”) will collect, use and store your personal data in accordance with this Personal Information Collection Statement, the Club HKT Privacy Statement (https://www.theclub.com.hk/en/privacy-policy.html) (“Club HKT Privacy Statement”), the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance, and the terms and conditions of the products and services to which you subscribe.
This Personal Information Collection Statement applies to any personal data that you provide to us or which we collect, generate and/or compile about you in connection with the products or services to which you subscribe (collectively, "Data").  We may collect Data directly from you, or indirectly from other members within the PCCW Group (being PCCW Limited and HKT Limited, and their respective subsidiaries, affiliates and associated companies (each a “Group Entity”)), publicly available sources or other third parties.
The Data marked with asterisks is mandatory. If you do not provide the mandatory Data, we may not be able to provide you with the services you have subscribed to. Data not marked with asterisks is optional. If you do not provide the optional Data, your user experience may be affected if that Data is used to enhance or personalise the services provided to you.

1. Purposes for which we use your Data
We may use and disclose your Data for the following purposes: (a) processing your application for membership, and administering your membership and reward issuance and redemption, of The Club (a loyalty program operated by Club HKT); (b) processing your application, registration or subscription for, and providing and administering, products, services or promotions provided or games or events organised by Club HKT; (c) processing and facilitating your application, registration or subscription for, and providing and administering, products, services or promotions provided or games or events organised by Group Entities and/or our business partners; (d) accessing and retrieving your account information and managing your account in relation to products or services provided or facilitated by Club HKT, our Group Entities, solely or in conjunction with our business partners; (e) with your consent, for the direct marketing purposes described in section 3 below;(f) analysing and maintaining customer or user profile, behaviour and usage patterns and conducting credit, risk, product and market analysis, research, survey, identity and data verification, fraud detection and prevention, security checks, credit checks and know your customer (including anti-money laundering and sanction) and other compliance checks, generating and compiling aggregated, anonymous, statistical and/or derived data; (g) complying with applicable laws, rules, regulations, guidelines and licence requirements or obligations in or outside Hong Kong as may be required by government authorities, courts, law enforcement, or regulatory or investigation bodies or industry best practices; (h) developing and improving products, services, business systems, operations and infrastructure and business planning; (i) enforcing contractual rights of Club HKT and/or Group Entities; (j) evaluating your financial needs and/or giving assistance in relation to insurance claims made by you; (k) any other purposes described in the Club HKT Privacy Statement; (l) any other purposes to which you consent; and (m) purposes which are directly related to any of the above purposes.

2. Persons to whom we may disclose your Data

Club HKT, its Group Entities and/or its marketing partners may send you direct marketing communications regarding the following types of products and services that any of them offer or market: TV, telecommunications, over-the-top (OTT) services, content services, mobile voice, SMS and data communications, IDD/roaming, Internet connectivity, cloud services, electronic/mobile payment, entertainment, secretarial services, personal assistant services and information services (such as weather, finance and news information), device accessories, mobile applications and software, computer peripheral, accessories and software (including notebooks, handsets, mobile devices and accessories, keyboards, security installations and mobile applications), reward, loyalty and privilege programs, lifestyle, networking events, travelling, banking, alcohol, sports, music, gaming, transportation, household products, food and beverages, finance, stored value facilities, electronic wallets, cryptocurrencies, digital assets, insurance, wealth and asset management services and products, pensions, investments, brokering, financial advisory, credit and other financial services and products, education, health and wellness, beauty products and services, fashion and accessories, electronics, social networking, technology, e-commerce, digital assets and related offerings and services, logistics, retail, home and décor, media and high-end consumer products and services, shopping malls and outlets, property developments, public services, utility services, donations and contributions for charitable and/or non-profit making purposes.
You may withdraw your consent to the use and/or disclosure of your Data for direct marketing purposes at any time by writing to Group Data Protection Officer (GPO Box 9896 or privacy@pccw.com).
